messages.message:
Feedback:
• frontend is much more responsive and performant
• variable file upload time, 25 pdfs in one conversation completed in ~1 min, 25 pdfs in another conversation completed in 2 1/2 min.
• when multiple files are being uploaded into a single conversation, completed uploads should be sorted to the top, while pending uploads should be sorted to the bottom
• when previously uploaded files are uploaded, files are uploaded freshly again vs reverting to the previously uploaded version
• would love to be able to multi-select documents in a conversation using shift+select to converse with multiple documents at the same time. For example, I have 25 documents in a conversation, but only the ability to converse with one document at a time.

Thanks a lot for the feedback, @John O'Hara.

Couple of follow up Qs:
• Did you try the same 25 docs for uploading? The system was quite stressed yesterday, so difference in loading performance is not unexpected. 
• re: sorting of docs, would you expect a different order once everything has uploaded? Will any sorting order changes (post the initial upload experience) be jarring? 
Supporting queries for multiple docs is the most requested feature across users. It is also a ton of work :slightly_smiling_face: We are going to focus on this in Q2, stay tuned!
